name: For Speed We Need!
overview: Released in GO64! 2005/01. This is an improved version of the original For Speed We Need, a racing game, in which you are to drive through the deadly road. You must survive through the time limit to be able to progress on to the next level. Now features a front end, some improved music, and also tweaks to the main code. Nicer cars as well, with special thanks to Nori Khiat for his sprites.
